text: The Dahla are a tribe of the Hazara ethnic group, found in Afghanistan. They are commonly listed among the eight major tribes, though not among the five "original tribes". One study indicated that the Dahla tribe were possibly extinct, and a subset of the Poladha tribe. ==See also== * Hazara tribes * Hazara people ==References== Category:Hazara tribes
title: Dahla (Hazara tribe)
